forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 38F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 37F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
